issue.title: Clean up code in RepositoryFunction

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
This abstract class now has a single subclass (`StarlarkRepositoryFunction`) and contains a bunch of semi-related static helper methods. This PR cleans it up a little, to make it easier to streamline `RepositoryDelegatorFunction`, `RepositoryFunction`, and `StarlarkRepositoryFunction`.

- `--experimental_worker_for_repo_fetching` is removed.
- `RepositoryFunction#setClientEnvironment` is removed in favor of a `Supplier` argument to the constructor of `StarlarkRepositoryFunction`.
- `RepositoryFunction#{isWorkspaceRepo, setupRepoRootBeforeFetching, reportSkyframeRestart, isAnyRecordedInputOutdated}` are inlined.
- `RepositoryFunction#{writeFile, getPathAttr, getTargetPath, symlinkLocalRepositoryContents, createSymbolicLink, getRuleDefinition}` are removed (no callers).
- `RepositoryFunction#addExternalFilesDependencies` is moved to `ExternalFilesHelper` (the only caller).

RELNOTES: `--experimental_worker_for_repo_fetching` is removed.

Work towards #26131.

issue.title: Stop using `Rule`+`Package` for repos

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Apologies for the size of this PR, but I couldn't really see a way to do this in incremental steps while actually exercising the new logic.

- When in the context of repos, `Rule` is replaced with `RepoDefinition` and `RuleClass` is replaced with `RepoRule`.
  - In a follow-up, we can remove all repo-related logic from `Rule` and `Package`.
- `BzlmodRepoRuleFunction`/`Value` are moved into the `lib/bazel/repository` package and renamed to `RepoDefinitionFunction`/`Value`.
- The logic to type-check attribute values is now shared between `TypeCheckedTag` and `RepoRule`, and extracted into an `AttributeUtils` class.
  - The label-validation logic that used to live in `AttributeValues` is also moved into `AttributeUtils`.
- `AttributeValues` now explicitly requires all attribute values to be valid Starlark values, instead of performing another transformation on construction. IMO this improves clarity.
- `bazel mod show_repo` now uses its own "repo definition printer", which also does away with a lot of useless information (like the call stack of repo rules -- the location suffices).

Work towards #26131.
